document.discussion_title: Patrick Vieira believes Arsenal lack 'personality' as former captain hits out at Arsene Wenger for shunning ex-players in coaching roles
document.topic_text: Patrick Vieira slams Arsenal: They are anything but ‘Invincibles’ now Vieira won three Premier League titles and four FA Cups during his time in north London and was part of the the Invincibles side which went through a season unbeaten in 2003/04. The Gunners have started this season sluggishly, losing 4-3 to Liverpool... Daily Express , yesterday, 16:52 in Sport Arsenal have a self-inflicted crisis surrounding their own captain. So why did Arsene Wenger hand the... There was more bad news for Arsenal at the weekend. They lost their captain to injury, probably until January. Yet that isn't the entire story. Bizarrely, the injury came before the captaincy. The player Arsene Wenger named as leader of his team, a... Daily Mail , Monday, 16:28 in Sport Arsenal legend: This is who I think will succeed Arsene Wenger The Gunners boss is into the final year of his contract. A number of names have been bandied about in the past as to who could manage the north London outfit next. And former Arsenal star Ray Parlour reckons Atletico Madrid’s Simeone is best suited to... Daily Express , 11 August 2016 in Sport Calum Chambers told to leave Arsenal by Ian Wright after he’s axed by Arsene Wenger for Leicester clash Calum Chambers has been told his Arsenal career is almost certainly over by Ian Wright after he was dropped for Saturday’s crucial match against Leicester. After his performance in last weekend’s defeat against Liverpool, Chambers was axed from the... Metro , Saturday, 17:36 in Sport Ray Parlour: Arsene Wenger should bring Shkodran Mustafi and Alexandre Lacazette to Arsenal Ray Parlour believes Alexandre Lacazette and Shkodran Mustafi would be ideal signings for Arsenal as they look to challenge for the Premier League title next season. The former Gunners star played under Arsene Wenger between 1996 and 2004 and was part... Metro , 10 August 2016 in Sport
